name: Cutting & Prep Station
note: Initial stage for cutting raw materials and prepping them for production.

name: Assembly Line A
note: Main assembly line for consumer electronics, handling various products.

name: Quality Control
note: Ensures all products meet quality standards before packaging.

name: Packaging Station
note: Packaging finished goods for shipment and retail distribution.

name: Warehouse & Inventory
note: Storage area for raw materials and finished goods management.

name: Final Inspection
note: Final checks and inspections before products leave the facility.

name: Painting & Finishing
note: Processes for painting and finishing products before assembly.

name: Logistics & Shipping
note: Handles the logistics and shipping of finished products to retailers.

name: Research & Development
note: Focuses on developing new products and improving existing ones.

name: Maintenance Workshop
note: Repairs and maintains machinery and equipment used in production.

name: Customer Service Area
note: Handles inquiries, complaints, and support for customers.

name: Training Facility
note: Dedicated space for employee training and skill development.
